title: Ecommerce Store
description: Information about a specific ecommerce store.

id.title: Store Foreign ID
id.description: The unique identifier for the store.

list_id.title: List ID
list_id.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp list that's associated with the store. The list_id for a specific store can't change.

platform.title: Store Platform
platform.description: The ecommerce platform of the store.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: The store domain.  The store domain must be unique within a user account.

is_syncing.title: Is Syncing
is_syncing.description: Whether the Ecommerce Store is currently syncing.

email_address.title: Email Address
email_address.description: The email address for the store.

currency_code.title: Currency
currency_code.description: The three-letter ISO 4217 code for the currency that the store accepts.

money_format.title: Money Format
money_format.description: The currency format for the store. For example: `$`, `£`, etc.

primary_locale.title: Primary Locale
primary_locale.description: The primary locale for the store. For example: `en`, `de`, etc.

address2.title: Address Field 2
address2.description: An additional field for the store's mailing address.

city.title: City
city.description: The city the store is located in.

province.title: Province
province.description: The store's state name or normalized province.

province_code.title: Province Code
province_code.description: The two-letter code for the store's province or state.

postal_code.title: Postal Code
postal_code.description: The store's postal or zip code.

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: The two-letter code for to the store's country.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The longitude of the store location.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: The latitude of the store location.

connected_site.title: Connected Site
connected_site.description: The Connected Site associated with the store.

site_foreign_id.title: Connected Site Foreign ID
site_foreign_id.description: The unique identifier for the connected site.
site_foreign_id.example: a180c384d7db88b if created in-app, MC001 if created via API

site_script.title: Script
site_script.description: The script used to connect your site with Mailchimp.

url.title: Script URL
url.description: The URL used for any integrations that offer built-in support for connected sites.

fragment.title: Script Fragment
fragment.description: A pre-built script that you can copy-and-paste into your site to integrate it with Mailchimp.

automations.title: Automations
automations.description: Details for the automations attached to this store.

is_supported.title: Is Supported
is_supported.description: Whether this store supports the abandonedCart automation.

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique ID of automation parent campaign.

abandoned_browse.title: Abandoned Browse Automation
abandoned_browse.description: abandonedBrowse automation details. abandonedBrowse is also known as Product Retargeting Email or Retarget Site Visitors on the web.

is_supported.title: Is Supported
is_supported.description: Whether this store supports the abandonedBrowse automation.

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique ID of automation parent campaign.

list_is_active.title: List Status
list_is_active.description: The status of the list connected to the store, namely if it's deleted or disabled.

created_at.title: Creation Time
created_at.description: The date and time the store was created in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.title: Update Time
updated_at.description: The date and time the store was last updated in ISO 8601 format.
